#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define lld long long int 

lld ar[]={0,1,4,3,8,5,2,7,6,9};

lld d(lld n)
{
	lld ans;
	
	if(n>=0&&n<=9)
	   ans=ar[n];
	 else
	    ans=(d(n/10)+d(n%10))%10;
		  
	 return ans;    
}

lld c(lld n)
{
	lld ans;
	
   if(n%10==0)
  	 {
	   ans=45*n/10;	
	  }
   else
      ans=c(n-1)+d(n-1);	  
	
	return ans;
}


int main()
{
	lld t,a,b,ans;

	cin>>t;

	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
		
		ans=0;
		
		ans=c(b+1)-c(a);
		
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	
return 0;
}
